description: Removes an owner from an entity.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain where you want to remove an owner from an entity.

parameters.name: entityIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the entity from which you want to remove an owner.

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: The type of the entity from which you want to remove an owner.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The owner that you want to remove from an entity. group (dict) --- Specifies that the domain unit owner is a group. The ID of the domain unit owners group. user (dict) --- Specifies that the domain unit owner is a user. The ID of the owner user.

nested_params.name: group
nested_params.description: Specifies that the domain unit owner is a group.

nested_params.name: groupIdentifier
nested_params.description: The ID of the domain unit owners group.

nested_params.name: user
nested_params.description: Specifies that the domain unit owner is a user.

nested_params.name: userIdentifier
nested_params.description: The ID of the owner user.
